code: import _objectSpread from"/Users/samilvaliahmetov/education/programming/schoolProject/my-app/main/client/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2";import{SET_USER_RECIPE_NEW_DATA,CHANGE_NEW_RECIPE_PRODUCT_COUNT}from'./actions';var initialState={time:null,title:null,actions:[],description:null,images:[],products:[],productsWithCount:[],rating:0,comments:[]};export var userRecipeReducer=function userRecipeReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SET_USER_RECIPE_NEW_DATA:{return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),action.payload);}case CHANGE_NEW_RECIPE_PRODUCT_COUNT:{return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{productsWithCount:state.productsWithCount.map(function(product){if(product[0]===action.payload.productName){return[product[0],action.payload.text];}return product;})});}default:{return state;}}};
